mapper.select: select d.d_num, d.M_ID, m.M_NICK, TO_CHAR(d.D_DATE, 'YYYYmmdd') as d_date, d.D_TEXT from CY_DIARY d join CY_MEMBER m on d.M_ID = m.M_ID where d.m_id = #{m_id} and d.D_DATE = #{d_date}

select dc.dc_num, d.D_NUM, m.M_id, m.M_NICK, TO_CHAR(dc.DC_TIME, 'YYYY-mm-dd hh24:mm') dc_time, dc.DC_TEXT, h.H_PIC from CY_DIARY_COMMENT dc join CY_DIARY d on dc.D_NUM = d.D_NUM join CY_MEMBER m on dc.M_ID = m.M_ID join CY_HOME h on dc.M_ID = h.M_ID where d.m_id = #{m_id} and d.D_DATE = #{d_date} order by dc.DC_NUM OFFSET #{startItem} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{itemsPerPage} ROWS ONLY
select count(*) from CY_DIARY_COMMENT dc join CY_DIARY d on dc.D_NUM = d.D_NUM where d.m_id = #{m_id} and d.D_DATE = #{d_date}
mapper.insert: insert into CY_DIARY_COMMENT(dc_text, d_num, m_id, dc_time) values(#{dc_text}, #{d_num}, #{m_id}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update CY_DIARY_COMMENT set dc_text = #{dc_text} where dc_num = #{dc_num}
mapper.insert: insert into cy_diary(m_id, d_text, d_date) values(#{m_id}, #{d_text}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'))
mapper.update: update CY_DIARY set d_text = #{d_text} where d_num = #{d_num}
